Trade/Device Name(s): Smartest Persona Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Smartest Persona Blood Glucose Monitoring System for quantitative glucose measurement using capillary whole blood and glucose oxidase methodology
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from the finger and forearm for home and healthcare professional use as an aid in monitoring diabetes control; not for diagnosis or neonatal use; includes audible result feature for users with low vision.
